程序包 sokobanfx.business

类 GameEngine

java.lang.Object
sokobanfx.business.GameEngine
public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
GameEngine is a singleton class which provide the whole control of the game.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getInstance

      public static GameEngine getInstance​(java.io.InputStream input, boolean production)
      Uses a File to load the game map containing all the levels or a single level.
      参数:
      input - the input file
      production - true if using the engine in live mode, false only for testing mode.
      返回:
      the GameEngine object

    • getCurrentLevel

      public static Level getCurrentLevel()
      Returns the current level.
      返回:
      the current level.

    • getNextLevel

      public Level getNextLevel()
      Returns the next level in the list of levels.
      返回:
      the next level loaded from the save file.

    • move

      public void move​(java.awt.Point delta)
      Handles the movement of the keeper and the objects that collide with it
      参数:
      delta - the movement delta

    • isGameComplete

      public boolean isGameComplete()
      Returns true if the game is complete.
      返回:
      true if the game is complete, false otherwise

    • setIsGameComplete

      public void setIsGameComplete​(boolean gameComplete)
      Sets if the game is complete or not
      参数:
      gameComplete - if the game complete

    • saveScore

      public void saveScore()
      Saves the score which includes level name, user name and moves count.

    • getMovesCount

      public static int getMovesCount()
      Gets the moves count.
      返回:
      the moves count

    • setMovesCount

      public static void setMovesCount​(int movesCount)
      Sets the moves count.
      参数:
      movesCount - the moves count

    • movePipe

      public boolean movePipe​(int x, int y, java.awt.Point targetObjectPoint)
      Check if the keeper can move through pipes
      参数:
      x - delta in x
      y - delta in y
      targetObjectPoint - the targetObject of keeper
      返回:
      if the move is crossed the pipes

    • moveFloor

      public boolean moveFloor​(java.awt.Point delta)
      Moves on floor.
      参数:
      delta - the distance
      返回:
      true

    • moveCrate

      public boolean moveCrate​(java.awt.Point delta, java.awt.Point targetObjectPoint, GameObject keeperTarget)
      Moves the crate.
      参数:
      delta - the distance
      targetObjectPoint - the target object point
      keeperTarget - the target object of keeper
      返回:
      true if the crate can be moved, otherwise false
